actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit smoking on board passenger-carrying aircraft in only one designated area.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit smoking in more than one designated area of a passenger-carrying aircraft. Requires air carriers to provide a seat for any passenger who wishes to be seated in a no-smoking section.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit smoking on board passenger-carrying aircraft in only one designated area.
